code: import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,compose,createStore}from"redux";import profileReducer from"./profile-reducer";import messagesReducer from"./messages-reducer";import sidebarReducer from"./sidebar-redcuder";import usersReducer from"./users-reducer";import authReducer from"./auth-reducer";import thunkMiddleware from"redux-thunk";import{reducer,reducer as formReducer}from"redux-form";import appReducer from"./app-reducer";var reducers=combineReducers({profilePage:profileReducer,messagesPage:messagesReducer,sidebar:sidebarReducer,usersPage:usersReducer,auth:authReducer,form:formReducer,app:appReducer});var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(reducers,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware)));/*let store = createStore(reducers, applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware));*/window.store=store;export default store;
